turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Solomon.
turn.1: What happened during the reign of Solomon?
turn.2: Solomon is described as surrounding himself with all the luxuries and the grandeur of an Eastern monarch, and his government prospered.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: He entered into an alliance with Hiram I, king of Tyre, who in many ways greatly assisted him in his numerous undertakings.
turn.5: What were some of his numerous undertakings?
turn.6: For some years before his death, David was engaged in collecting materials for building a temple in Jerusalem as a permanent home for Yahweh and the Ark of the Covenant.
turn.7: Did he succeed in doing so?
turn.8: Solomon is described as undertaking the construction of the temple, with the help of an architect, also named Hiram, and other materials, sent from King Hiram of Tyre.
turn.10: After the completion of the temple, Solomon is described in the biblical narrative as erecting many other buildings of importance in Jerusalem.
turn.11: Did he live in a palace?
turn.12: For 13 years, he was engaged in the building of a royal palace on Ophel (a hilly promontory in central Jerusalem).
